title: Client shows in-game time for friends incorrectly
body:
Like for example, my friend was in a game 5 minutes in. But when I hover over his name on the client, it says something crazy like 72:00 or something like that. Not a big deal, but is there any way I can fix it?

My clock computer is accurate too, if that might be a cause.

replies.body: Hmmmm that might be happening if the match data from his previous match hadn't been fully uploaded to the servers yet. I'm curious if this is messing anything up within the client for you or if refreshing the client might be able to reset that timer.
